Package soc.game

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ResourceSet
    Represents an immutable set of resources To construct a mutable set, see SOCResourceSet.
    SOCBoard.BoardFactory
    Board Factory for creating new boards for games at the client or server.
    SOCDevCardConstants
    This is a list of constants for representing types of development cards in Settlers of Catan.
    SOCGameEventListener
    Listener for game-wide and per-player events on the large sea board.
    SOCGameOption.ChangeListener
    Listener for option value changes at the client during game creation.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SOCBoard
    This is a representation of the board in Settlers of Catan.
    SOCBoard.DefaultBoardFactory
    Default implementation of SOCBoard.BoardFactory, used at client.
    SOCBoard4p
    The classic 4-player board with 19 land hexes, surrounded by a ring of 18 sea hexes/ports.
    SOCBoard6p
    The classic (non-sea) board layout for the 6-player extension.
    SOCBoardLarge
    Sea board layout: A representation of a larger (up to 127 x 127 hexes) JSettlers board, with an arbitrary mix of land and water tiles.
    SOCCity
    A city playing piece
    SOCDevCard
    A single Development Card, probably within a player's SOCInventory.
    SOCForceEndTurnResult
    The results of a call to SOCGame.forceEndTurn(): The resulting action type, and possibly list of discarded or returned resources or dev card/inventory item.
    SOCFortress
    A fortress playing piece, used on the large sea board (SOCBoardLarge) with some scenarios.
    SOCGame
    A class for holding and manipulating game data.
    SOCGame.RollResult
    Dice roll result, for reporting from SOCGame.rollDice().
    SOCGameOption
    Game-specific options, configurable at game creation.
    SOCGameOptionSet
    A set of SOCGameOptions, either those of a game, or all possible Known Options at a server or client: SOCServerGameOptionSet.getAllKnownOptions().
    SOCInventory
    This represents a player's collection of development cards (SOCDevCard) and occasional scenario-specific items (SOCInventoryItem).
    SOCInventoryItem
    An inventory item, either a SOCDevCard or a scenario-specific item, held in a player's hand (SOCInventory) to be played later or kept until scoring at the end of the game.
    SOCLRPathData
    DOCUMENT ME!
    SOCMoveRobberResult
    At server, this class holds the results of moving the robber or pirate: The victim or possible victims, and what was stolen.
    SOCOldLRStats
    This keeps track of the old LR stats (Longest Road).
    SOCPlayer
    A class for holding and manipulating player data.
    SOCPlayer.SpecialVPInfo
    Holds details of SOCPlayer.getSpecialVP().
    SOCPlayerNumbers
    This class tracks what dice-roll numbers a player's pieces are touching, and the probability of getting resources based on their hex types.
    SOCPlayingPiece
    Playing pieces for Settlers of Catan.
    SOCResourceConstants
    This is a list of constants for representing types of resources in Settlers of Catan.
    SOCResourceSet
    This represents a collection of clay, ore, sheep, wheat, and wood resources.
    SOCRoad
    A road playing piece.
    SOCRoutePiece
    A playing piece that connects settlements and cities and can be part of the Longest Route: A SOCRoad or SOCShip.
    SOCScenario
    Scenarios for game rules and options on the large sea board.
    SOCSettlement
    A settlement playing piece
    SOCShip
    A ship playing piece, on the large sea board (SOCBoardLarge).
    SOCSpecialItem
    A Special Item in a game that uses Settlers scenarios or expansions.
    SOCSpecialItem.Requirement
    Data structure and parser for a special item's requirements.
    SOCTradeOffer
    This class represents a trade offer in Settlers of Catan and/or is part of a network message about trades.
    SOCVersionedItem
    Information/objects which can change or have new ones with different versions.
    SOCVillage
    A village playing piece, used on the large sea board (SOCBoardLarge) with some scenarios.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GameState  
    SOCGame.SeatLockState
    Seat lock states for lock/unlock.
    SOCGameEvent
    Scenario event codes which affect the game or board, not only a specific player.
    SOCPlayerEvent
    Per-player event codes sent to SOCGameEventListeners.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SOCGameOptionVersionException
    This exception indicates game option(s) too new for a client.
